caption.p: Binding pattern of C. fistula major chemical constituents with the NH of L. donovani. 2D plot, surface representation of protein binding pocket residues, and its significant interactions with (A) proanthocyanidin B dimer, (B) apigenin- C-hexoside- O-pentoside, (C) 3,4-di- O-caffeoylquinic acid, and (D) kaempferol rhamnosylxyloside.
